body:
Resume

ANDREW HAUSDORF

Education

WASHINGTON UNIVERSITY, OLIN BUSINESS SCHOOL, ST. LOUIS, MO BSBA Candidate, Majors in Economics and Strategy and Entrepreneurship, Minor in Computer Science
  • Enterprise Holdings Scholar, John M. Olin Scholar, Bright Flight Scholar
WHU-OTTO BEISHEIM SCHOOL OF MANAGEMENT, VALLENDAR, GERMANY
  • Semester Abroad Coursework: Entrepreneurial Opportunities and Business Models, Logistics, Spanish, and Biotechnology
UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA LOS ANGELES, WESTWOOD, CA Summer Coursework: Disruptive Innovation in Entrepreneurship and the Design of Business

Experience

THE COFFEE KIT
Summer Intern
Santiago, Chile
  • Researched countries for future expansion based on business environment
  • Gathered information on investment programs and incubators
  • Collected coffee beans from suppliers and delivered to customers during the site launch
GOODPEOPLE
Business Development Intern
Buenos Aires, Argentina
  • Researched and recommended user acquisition strategies
  • Searched for new brands to join the site and created spreadsheets to track social media activity among these suppliers
  • Compiled information on Google+ SEO and Authorship options for website content
ST LOUIS INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY ENTREPRENEUR NETWORK (ITEN)
  • Created a minimum viable product with Ruby on Rails for www.exacerboom.com, a social content sharing site
  • Developed an idea and business plan for Ch33se, a .gif sharing and image capturing mobile app

Activities

WASHINGTON UNIVERSITY CLASS OF 2015 TREASURER
  • Ran a successful campaign and received 35% of total votes in the election
  • Advocated to the Wash U Student Union on behalf of a 1500 student Freshman Class
  • Wrote treasury appeals that resulted in several thousand dollars of additional event funding
WASHINGTON UNIVERISTY TECHNOLOGY ENTREPRENEURS (WUTE) PHI DELTA THETA FRATERNITY
  • Active member of a national fraternity that emphasizes personal and community development

Skills

  • Computer Skills: Microsoft Office 2013, Google Adwords, Facebook Ad Manager, Shopify
  • Programming Skills: Basic Ruby on Rails, Java, HTML, and CSS
  • Language Skills: Intermediate Spanish
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
